Dan would know better, but I don't know how much of the Giphy's display we can control ourselves. But on the whole, the better aligned these styles are, the better and more cohesive the UI will look

Thoughts on migrating the existing popovers to use the style of our DropdownWidget?

It looks good.

The input styles in the Giphy popover should be the same as in the emoji popover. Right now, they are not, and it's definitely a regression from our current design. In this popover, we can control almost everything except the grid that is rendered by the @giphy/js-components package.
